overview: This yearâ€™s highly anticipated CBeebies Christmas Show is once again coming to the big screen from the theatre stage for a family-friendly feast of Christmas fun, premiering on 30th November and running throughout December.  The show is an adaptation of fairy-tale classic Hansel and Gretel and will again feature many of CBeebies' most popular talent, including, for the first time - Waffle the Wonder Dog!  Audiences will also get a chance to see exclusive, additional content specially-made for the cinema.
title: CBeebies Presents: Hansel and Gretel
